img_summary: The image depicts a formula document related to various medicinal concoctions in the game "Black Myth: Wukong." It is associated with rare and epic formulas such as the Longevity Decoction, Tonifying Decoction, Fortifying Medicament, and Body-Fleeting Powder. These formulas are obtained through specific quests and interactions with the character Xu Dog in different locations and chapters of the game, indicating their narrative role in enhancing the player's abilities or progress.
